DOC.brief_summary: This study is being conducted to determine the effect of enzalutamide on the androgen signaling pathway in correlation with the anti-tumor effects of enzalutamide to identify potential predictors of response or resistance to therapy.
DOC.brief_title: Determine the Effect of Enzalutamide (Formerly MDV3100) on the Androgen Signaling Pathway in Correlation With the Anti-tumor Effects of Enzalutamide to Identify Potential Predictors of Response or Resistance to Therapy
DOC.criteria: Confirmed prostate cancer Presence of metastatic disease to the bone Ongoing androgen deprivation therapy Severe concurrent disease Metastases in the brain
